response:
Pattern best fits a chronic axonal sensorimotor neuropathy; causes prioritised by prevalence and clinical fit, with reversible metabolic and systemic aetiologies considered first.

differential_diagnosis = ["Diabetic distal symmetric polyneuropathy", "Vitamin B12 deficiency neuropathy", "Hypothyroid neuropathy", "Alcohol-related axonal polyneuropathy", "Uremic neuropathy", "Paraproteinemic neuropathy (MGUS/multiple myeloma/amyloidosis)", "Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy (CIDP)", "HIV-associated distal symmetric polyneuropathy", "Drug-induced peripheral neuropathy"]
